name: Steam Name Generator
description: Stuck with a boring Steam name? Level up your online persona with our rad Steam Name Generator! Get names so cool, they'll make Gabe Newell jealous.
introduction: Let's face it, your current Steam name probably isn't cutting it. You need something that screams 'pro gamer' (even if you're mostly just losing to 12-year-olds). Our Steam Name Generator is here to rescue you from name mediocrity. Prepare for names so epic, they'll give you +10 charisma in every lobby.
howToUse: Click the 'Generate' button. Seriously, that's it. We made it *that* easy.
Marvel at the awesomeness of the name we've conjured for you.
If you're not feeling it (gasp!), click 'Generate' again. We've got names for days.
Copy your favorite name and paste it into your Steam profile.
Prepare to be showered with friend requests and compliments. You're welcome.

faqs.question: Is this generator actually cool?
faqs.answer: Is water wet? Of course, it's cool! We've poured our hearts and souls (and a whole lot of caffeine) into making sure these names are top-tier.

faqs.question: Will this generator make me a better gamer?
faqs.answer: While we can't guarantee instant gaming prowess, a killer name is half the battle. Think of it as a psychological advantage. Your opponents will be too intimidated to even try.

faqs.question: Can I use these names for other things besides Steam?
faqs.answer: Absolutely! Use them for Twitch, Discord, your pet hamster... the possibilities are endless! Just promise us you'll credit us when you become famous.

faqs.question: Are the generated names unique?
faqs.answer: We strive to generate unique and awesome names. However, with millions of users, there's a slight chance of overlap. If you find a name you love, snag it quick!

faqs.question: Is this generator free?
faqs.answer: You betcha! Our Steam Name Generator is 100% free to use. We just want to spread the joy of awesome names to the masses.

faqs.question: How often are new names added?
faqs.answer: We are always working to improve our generator with new and interesting names. Check in regularly to see what’s new!
